mapper.sql: f_contract_id as contractId, f_symbol as identifier, f_currency as currency, f_exchange as exchange, f_identifier as identifier, f_local_symbol as localSymbol, f_long_initial_margin as longInitialMargin, f_long_maintenance_margin as longMaintenanceMargin, f_market as market, f_min_tick as minTick, f_name as name1, f_primary_exchange as primaryExchange, f_sec_type as secType, f_short_fee_rate as shortFeeRate, f_short_margin as shortMargin, f_shortable as shortable, f_tiger_status as status, f_continuous as continuous, f_trade as trade, f_trading_class as tradingClass, f_expiry as expiry, f_contract_month as contractMonth, f_strike as strike, f_right as right1, f_multiplier as multiplier
mapper.insert: insert into t_symbol_info ( f_expiry, f_contract_month, f_strike, f_right, f_multiplier, f_short_margin, f_short_fee_rate, f_long_initial_margin, f_shortable, f_long_maintenance_margin, f_contract_id,f_identifier,f_symbol,f_sec_type,f_exchange,f_market,f_primary_exchange,f_currency,f_local_symbol,f_name,f_tiger_status,f_min_tick,f_trade,f_continuous,f_trading_class ) value ( #{expiry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strike,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{right,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{multiplier,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shortMargin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shortFeeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{longInitialMargin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shortable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longMaintenanceMargin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{contractId},#{identifier},#{symbol},#{secType},#{exchange},#{market},#{primaryExchange},#{currency},#{localSymbol},#{name},#{status},#{minTick},#{trade},#{continuous},#{tradingClass} )
